messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: I have lived in West Suffolk with my family for 20 years. I am not a career politician but I am your local candidate and have a vested interest in the area we live in.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Leave the EU and use the resulting £53.8 billion in direct costs to increase pensions and reduce taxes for those in work.
Return all illegal immigrants to their countries of origin.

issues.brexitEurope: Leave the EU and use the resulting £53.8 billion in direct costs to increase pensions and reduce taxes for those in work.
issues.economy: Use the resulting £53.8 billion from leaving the EU to increase pensions and reduce taxes for those in work.
issues.immigration: Return all illegal immigrants to their countries of origin.

images.caption: Ian Smith - UKIP Candidate for West Suffolk

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet emphasizes the importance of voting and mentions that nearly 40% of people who felt unable to vote at the last general election want a real change in British politics, promising independence from the EU.
